title: Which Zodiac Sign is Most Likely to Succeed?

steps.title: Capricorns are the most high-achieving sign in the entire zodiac.
steps.content: Capricorns are the most high-achieving sign in the entire zodiac. Ruling the 10th house of career, status, and goals, it’s no wonder Capricorn has a penchant for success. A cardinal Earth sign, Capricorns prioritize accomplishment and tangible results above all else. Ruled by Saturn (the planet of responsibility), Capricorns thrive on the duty that comes from a highly-accomplished lifestyle. Career fulfillment is their primary motivation. [1] X Research source Where they excel: business management, medicine (especially surgery), finance, engineering

steps.title: Tauruses are patient perfectionists with a great work ethic.
steps.content: Tauruses are patient perfectionists with a great work ethic. Like the bull that represents them, Taurus will keep plodding along no matter what you throw at them. As a fixed sign, they’re confident and strong-willed, so they’re not easily demoralized by outside influences. Plus, they’re ruled by Venus, the planet of outer beauty and material wealth, so luxury is hugely important to them. They’ll work tirelessly to maintain a prosperous lifestyle. Where they excel: fashion, art, and hospitality

steps.title: Scorpios are equal parts hustler and charmer.
steps.content: Scorpios are equal parts hustler and charmer. Scorpios are nocturnally ruled by Mars, the planet of aggression and passion. This means they have all the drive and courage to succeed, but it manifests in a more calculated, seductive way. Plus, Scorpio is a water sign so they have sublime emotional insight and people skills. Scorpios have both the natural drive to succeed and the ability to connect with people so their success is well-received. Where they excel: business management, law, politics, education

steps.title: Sagittarius has a natural talent that follows them everywhere.
steps.content: Sagittarius has a natural talent that follows them everywhere. Sagittarius is ruled by Jupiter, the planet of luck, growth, and expansion. This good fortune makes it easy for them to prosper wherever they go (and they go pretty much everywhere; they rule the 9th house of travel). On top of that, they’re a mutable fire sign, which means they’re creative and adaptable. They’re filled with boundless ideas that can be molded to fit all kinds of situations. Where they excel: consulting, public relations, entertainment, tourism

steps.title: Virgos are nurturing perfectionists with an eye for detail.
steps.content: Virgos are nurturing perfectionists with an eye for detail. Virgo rules the 6th house of service and day-to-day tasks. This tracks, because they’re meticulous and efficient, and they flourish in the world of routine. Virgo loves to help people and they’re great at finding ways to improve even the most minute things. Virgos pay better attention than anybody, which gives them a successful edge no other sign has. [2] X Research source Where they excel: proofreading, editing, researching, translating

steps.title: Libras are sharp and diplomatic; they bring out the best in everyone.
steps.content: Libras are sharp and diplomatic; they bring out the best in everyone. Like the scales that balance them, Libras are big on justice. A cardinal air sign, Libra isn’t easily swayed by emotion, but their rulership in the 7th house of balance means they’re great at getting people to see eye-to-eye. Libras are extraordinary collaborators; people trust their leadership. Plus, they’re ruled by Venus, so they have a natural eye for beauty and aesthetics. [3] X Research source Where they excel: politics, international relations, art, decorating, design

steps.title: Geminis are brilliant; they can adapt to succeed anywhere.
steps.content: Geminis are brilliant; they can adapt to succeed anywhere. Gemini is ruled by Mercury, the planet of thought and communication. Their superb social skills make them the life of the party and people can easily grasp their ideas, because of how well they convey them. Plus, Geminis are mutable, which means their intellect is great at shifting to accommodate new information. Flexibility is key to success and Gemini is the most flexible sign in the zodiac. Where they excel: social networking, sales, theater, film, customer service

steps.title: Aries are brave go-getters who can build anything from the ground up.
steps.content: Aries are brave go-getters who can build anything from the ground up. The first and youngest sign in the zodiac, Aries is all about new beginnings. A cardinal fire sign, Aries bring fresh, creative ideas wherever they go. And their Mars rulership means they’re natural leaders who like seizing new business opportunities. When Aries is passionate about something, they’ll find a way to make it happen no matter what. Their drive is stronger than anyone’s. Where they excel: entrepreneurship, coaching, sales, pretty much anything freelance

steps.title: Leos are irresistible leaders who aren’t afraid to take risks.
steps.content: Leos are irresistible leaders who aren’t afraid to take risks. Like the sun that rules them, Leos are bright, warm, and attention-seeking. They’re extremely bold and light up just about any room they’re in. As a fixed fire sign, they’re also not discouraged by opposition. They’re comfortable in high-risk, high-profile positions. Leos welcome a challenge, which makes them poised for both career and personal success. [4] X Research source Where they excel: film, music, theater, fashion, politics

steps.title: Pisces are intuitive and bring out the best in people one-on-one.
steps.content: Pisces are intuitive and bring out the best in people one-on-one. A mutable water sign and the oldest, wisest member of the zodiac, Pisces can make you feel like they’ve known you their whole life in just an introduction. They’re deep feelers and even bigger dreamers (ruled by Neptune, the planet of emotion and boundless imagination). Looking over the 12th house of seclusion and mysticism, Pisces tend to be introverted. But their boundless well of compassion and insight make them more equipped for intimacy than any other placement. Where they excel: nursing, psychiatry, religion (they make great spiritual leaders and healers)

steps.title: Aquarians can improve the world with their clever insight.
steps.content: Aquarians can improve the world with their clever insight. Ruling the 11th house of community, and humanity, Aquarians are deeply progressive and team-oriented. They prioritize freedom and ending systemic injustice above all, and, since they’re an air sign, they often have the innovative ideas to make their utopian dreams a reality. Aquarius’ ideas of success are nontraditional, but when it comes to making large societal changes, they’re the best by a landslide. [5] X Research source Where they excel: speech writing, philanthropy, community organization, art

steps.title: Cancers are endlessly empathetic; they make everyone feel loved.
steps.content: Cancers are endlessly empathetic; they make everyone feel loved. Since they’re a cardinal water sign, how you’re feeling is of the utmost importance to Cancers. They bring their emotional wisdom and caring to just about any situation and are great at looking out for people’s mental well-being. Career success isn’t a huge priority to Cancer, but their presence is refreshing and they know how to cultivate meaningful relationships like nobody else. Where they excel: social work, customer relations, childcare
